statements: SELECT * FROM access_logs;
SELECT log_id, user_id, action_taken, access_time FROM access_logs;
SELECT user_id, action_taken FROM access_logs WHERE log_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM access_logs ORDER BY access_time DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM access_logs;
SELECT * FROM access_logs WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY access_time DESC;
SELECT log_id, user_id, access_time FROM access_logs WHERE action_taken = 'login' ORDER BY log_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_logs FROM access_logs GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_logs > 10;
SELECT * FROM access_logs WHERE user_id IN (101, 102, 103) ORDER BY user_id DESC, access_time ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM access_logs WHERE access_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT id, username FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE id >= 5;
SELECT * FROM access_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, action, timestamp FROM access_logs WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM access_logs WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, username, email FROM users WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT id, username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com%' AND username LIKE 'user%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, user_id, timestamp, action FROM access_logs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM access_logs JOIN users ON access_logs.user_id = users.id WHERE users.username = 'admin' ORDER BY access_logs.timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM access_logs ORDER BY access_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, action FROM audit_logs WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT username, email FROM user_accounts WHERE username LIKE 'joh%';
SELECT user_id, audit_timestamp, action FROM audit_logs WHERE audit_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) FROM access_logs GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM user_accounts WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT action, audit_timestamp FROM audit_logs ORDER BY audit_timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, user_id, access_timestamp FROM access_logs WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY access_timestamp ASC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS num_actions FROM audit_logs GROUP BY user_id HAVING num_actions > 5;
SELECT * FROM access_logs;
SELECT user_id, action_taken FROM access_logs ORDER BY access_time DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM audit_logs WHERE action_performed = 'login' AND performed_by = 2;
SELECT report_text, report_generated_on FROM audit_reports WHERE audit_id = 5 ORDER BY report_generated_on ASC;
SELECT * FROM access_logs WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY access_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, action_taken FROM access_logs WHERE action_taken ILIKE 'Logged in%' AND access_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT report_id, report_text FROM audit_reports WHERE report_generated_on > '2022-01-01' AND report_text IS NOT NULL ORDER BY report_generated_on DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM audit_logs WHERE action_performed IN ('Added user', 'Updated user') AND performed_by = 5 ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 20;
SELECT * FROM access_logs;
SELECT id, username, access_time FROM access_logs ORDER BY access_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT username, email FROM user_accounts WHERE user_id > 100 ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT audit_time, audit_details FROM audit_logs WHERE auditor_username = 'admin' ORDER BY audit_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM access_logs ORDER BY access_time DESC;
SELECT username, accessed_data FROM access_logs WHERE username = 'alice';
SELECT * FROM user_accounts WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_accounts WHERE user_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT role_name, permission_level FROM role_permissions WHERE permission_level >= 3;
